summary: i like how her horns look?  new sketchbook! [id: A sketchy acrylic drawing of Jester. She is a blue tiefling with short, blue...
caption:
i like how her horns look?  new sketchbook!
[id: A sketchy acrylic drawing of Jester. She is a blue tiefling with short, blue hair in a blue dress.  Background is done is hues of orange, the drawing has a lot of texture. There is a single tear rolling down her cheek. end id]

blog.name: abronzeagegod
blog.title: A Lost Bronze Age God
blog.description: A terrible god, lost and abandoned amidst the sands of time only to be recovered sometime in the early 1990's when a new housing development was built on top of him. This out-of-time deity occasionally writes things of merit, but mostly wonders why the Void never returns his calls.

body:
Critical role discord

Were a discord group mostly focused on the mighty nein and following along or just talking about the newest campaign. There are places to share art, ships and theories or just ramble about how much you love these nerds and the characters! We also have a spoiler chat for people who watch live and wait about a week until the most current episode it talked about in any other channel.

If you’d like to join just pm me or comment here and ill get back to you with the link

blog.name: critroletrash
blog.title: I Am What It Says, Critical Role trash
blog.description: I was annoying folks on my main blog so this is my Critical Role side blog. Join me in my love for these amazing characters and the actors responsible for them.

tags: the one of Kaylee still makes me cry like a baby
summary: I just realized I have all this art from when I was a Patreon supporter of Ioana Mureson (the one who did the art on the CR...
body:
I just realized I have all this art from when I was a Patreon supporter of Ioana Mureson (the one who did the art on the CR Tarot cards) that I wanted to share with everyone.

1. Grog learning to read with Pike

2. Scanlan with Mythcarver and Bigby’s Hand

3. Vax giving Pike fun buns

4. Vex and Trinket resting after a rough battle

5. Twinsies hugging after Thordak

6. Kaylee playing at the ressurection ritual
